shri lankawe warshika pol nishpadanaya me wasaredi pol gedi miliyana 3000 k ikma wanuathayi wayambaa ekspot and tredin hawus paudgalika samagama anawaranaya karayi.pol kiri hapit yana nishpadana sandaha uparima washayen pol gedi miliyana 2620 k pamana awashya wethayi kiyana samagama me anuwa koppara polthel karmanthaya sandaha pol gedi miliyana 400 kata wadi pramanayak ithiriwana namuth pasugiya wasare me karmanthaya sandaha bhawitha karanu labuwe pol gedi miliyana 450 k pamana bawath 2008 wasare koppara polthel karmanthaya sandaha polgedi miliyana 444 k bhawitha kota thibena bawath pawasayi.diwayine wisheshayen wayambaa polthel karmanthaya binda watimata pradhana hethuwa wi aththe wenath aadeshaka thel warga karmanthaye paladayithawa adukota nishpadana wala gunathmaka bhawaya adukama meyata thadinma balapa atha..

(gampaha usawiye nadu anka 791 - 2013 ha wi 1435 - 2013) adhikaranaya magin ema awasthawedi polisiyata danwa sitiye adala aayathanayangen jalaya pilibanda wartha labagena me pilibanda illim karana lesayi.mema udghoshanaya nawathwa damime prayogika kramawedayak lesa pradeshaye deshapalana adhikariya karmantha shalawe palakayin gen mema karmanthashalawa thawakalikawa wasa damana lesa juli masa 31 wana dina illimak karana lada athara, eki illimata awanatha wemin thawakalikawa karmantha shalawa wasa damimata karmantha shalawe palanadhikariya ekanga wini.me atharathuradi udghoshanakaruwan karmantha shalawa wasa dama thibiyadith udghoshanaya nonawathwa pawathwa gena yana bawa peni giya heyin agosthu 01 dina pa. wa. 4.00 aarakshaka amathyanshayedi aarakshaka lekamthuma adala parshwakaruwan kandawa me pilibanda karunu pahadadima matha mema awasthawedi ema karmantha shalawa thawaduratath adala aayathanayangen wartha laba ganna thek thawakalikawa wasa damimata palana adhikariya thawaduratath ekanga wana ladi.esema thawakalikawa jalaya sapayima sandaha tanki labadimatath, nala jalaya labadimata jala nala elimatath ehidi ekangathawata paminena ladi.

ewita dewiyanwahansegen napuru aathmaya oba kerehi thibena kala, obata suwawena pinisa ohu thamage athin gayanakaranneyayi kiwoya. 17 sawul kathakota: hondata gayanakarana manushyayeku soya ohu ma langata genennayi thamage sewakayanta kiweya. 18 ewita wadakarayangen ekkenek uththara demin: gayanakaranta dannawu, beth-lehemiya yessege puthrayeku dutimi, ohu balawath wikramanwitha purushayekwa, yuddhakarayekwa, kathawehi dakshawu rupasampannawu kenekwa sitiyi, swaminwahanseth ohu samangayayi kiweya. 19 ebawin sawul yesse wetha paniwidakarayan yawa: bataluwan samanga sitina obe puthrawu dawith ma langata ewannayi kiya yawiya. 20 ewita yesse rotida mudrikapana bhajanayakda elupatawekda kotaluweku pita patawa eewa thamage puthrawu dawith atha sawulta ariyeya. 21 dawith sawul langata awith ohu idiriyehi sitiyeya.

- janadhipathisunil daya alwiswishwawidyala abhyanthara saha bahira shishyayan labana upadhiye kisidu wenasak nothibiya yuthu bawa mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithuma pawasayi.usas adhyapana amathyanshaye pragathi samalochana raswima ema amathyansha shrawanagarayedi ikuth sikurada (01) pawathi awasthawe di janadhipathithuma me bawa awadharanaya kara sitiye ya.meratin pitarata gos aapasu nopamina sitina wishwawidyala aacharyawarunta rate nidahas adhyapana sewawa wenuwen nawatha sewaya kirimata meratata paminennayi da mema pragathi samalochana raswimedi janadhipathithuma illa sitiye ya.rate wishwawidyalawala aacharyawarun 650 k pamana wideshagathawa sitina athara owungen athamun aapasu gewiya yuthu mudal rupiyal laksha 50 - 60 aadi washayen pawathina bawa da mehidi anawaranaya wiya.me aya wenuwen sahana salasime wadapiliwelak arambaimata sudanam bawa da janadhipathithuma kiya.usas adhyapana amathi es.bi. disanayaka mahatha da me sambandhayen adahas idiripath karamin pawasuwe pitarata giya wishwawidyala aacharyawarun sahena pirisak nawatha merata eemata kamaththen sitina bawayi.mathi amathiwaru saha usas adhyapana amathyanshaye da adhyapana amathyanshaye da lekamwaru athulu niladharihu da mema pragathi samalochana raswimata sahabhagi wuha.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha
